messages.title: This election will be the most important in a generation.
messages.content: Johnson's Deal will lead to the break up of the United Kingdom.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for fairer funding for schools and colleges in our area.
More money for the NHS and social care.
Seek greater investment in our transport infrastructure.
More affordable homes for our young people.
Tackle the climate emergency and support local businesses and farmers.

mentions.candidate: David Chalmers is not your usual career politician
